/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up at the towering trees that line the street. These trees, with their lush green leaves, provide a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene and creating a lens flare in the top right corner of the image. The street itself is devoid of any human presence, adding to the tranquility of the scene. The image does not contain any text or discernible actions. The relative positions of the objects suggest a well-planned urban layout, with the trees neatly lining the street and the buildings maintaining a respectful distance. The image is a testament to the harmonious coexistence of nature and urban development in Beijing.
